Name: UPI
OrganisationName: National Payments Corporation of India / Reserve Bank of India

Name: Aadhaar
OrganisationName: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
Notes: Developer access to via 3rd party providers

Name: DigiLocker
OrganisationName: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology

Name: MyNumber
Notes: API documentation appears to be by request. Use by non government entities needs to be explicitly authorised by law

Name: DigiYatra
Notes: Biometric based identity, ticketing and e-gates system. Needs to be created using an existing identity document that can include Aadhaar, although Aadhaar number is not stored

Name: The Marketplace
Notes: Not 100% clear is central government only

Name: Bank ID
Notes: Provided by a private company, but adopted by major banks. It is used beyond banking in healthcare and document signing

Name: FOIA.gov
Notes: API provides a way for other agencies to update progress of applications. Code on github at https://github.com/usdoj/foia.gov

Name: pay.gov
OrganisationName: U.S. Department of the Treasury, Bureau of the Fiscal Service
Notes: 18F have a mock version for testing https://github.com/18F/mock-pay

Name: Local Government Directory
OrganisationName: Panchayats and State Panchayati Raj Department / Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
Notes: Built to enable DBT welfare payments

Name: AB Svenska Pass
SourceCodeLicence: One of 3 identity providers certificed by the Swedish government

Name: Freja eID
SourceCodeLicence: One of 3 identity providers certificed by the Swedish government

Name: Recreation.gov
Notes: Funded by multiple agencies: https://www.doi.gov/ocl/recreationgov. used to power private sector campsite booking services

Name: The Digital Analytics Program
Notes: Wrapper around Google Analytics. GSA also provides training to government agencies

Name: Le Taxi
SourceCodeLicence: Central government provides an Uber-like framework for taxi companies and app builders
